participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys deep conversations and exploring new ideas.
participant_1.background: No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes. My family is very supportive of my writing. I am close to my family and we often listen to music together. I drove my van to a music festival and met a group of people who made me try new things. I am looking to start a business.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, loves storytelling and sharing adventures.
participant_2.background: I keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden. I am in preschool. I have red hair. One of my favorite hobbies is gaming. I once wrote a song about a local legend in my town and got to perform it at the local music festival.

content.text: I like playing video games and working in my garden.
That's awesome! I like to play video games too, but I'm not very good at them.
That's okay! It's about having fun, not being good at them.
That's true. I love the feeling of being immersed in a game and forgetting about the real world for a while.
Me too! I like to play games that are really challenging.
I like games that are a little more relaxing.
What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play RPGs and adventure games.
Those are my favorite types of games too!
I've been playing a lot of Skyrim lately.
I love Skyrim! I've put so many hours into that game.
Me too! It's so much fun to explore the world and find new things.
I love the characters and the story.
I'm so glad we met! We can talk about games all day!
Me too! I'm so excited to have a friend to play games with.
